A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney made this movie for 2 reasons. To make a political statement and to star wars toys. Its funny though\, how they even failed to make a quality film that even a child would be like: \"This sucks dad\, lets watch Jumanji.\" This is coming from a guy who memorized the whole star wars encyclopedia when Star wars still had magic: \"It's time for Star Wars\, to end.\"
